name: Clayton C
text: Written by a tried and true carry-out customer: Soo let's start with the good stuff. The pizza has always been great. And the wings are some of the best in town since we have limited options. …More

name: Tonia Lee
text: We go here for the lunch buffet. Its always good but I wish they would put out more then one pasta dish and more then just those cinnamon sticks things for dessert. A variety would definately get 5 stars.

name: Dana Blair
text: The pizza was fantastic.  We love their thin crust. Good service and polite. My family and I enjoyed our time there. A good experience.

name: Mason Crane
text: Slow and not many toppings at all. I ordered two 5 toppings and they gave less than the amount I usually get for single toppings. Go to caseys instead! Well worth the extra money.

name: Lori Johnson
text: Boone, Iowa Pizza Hut LOOKS the BEST  it has for a very long time! Kudos to Shelley and her crew, for their hard work, and dedication to providing GREAT customer service, and DELICIOUS food! *Very Satisfied customer, who WILL BE BACK!!!

name: KayDee McFarland
text: I ordered a taco pizza with taco sauce, the pizza got here and there was no Doritos or lettuce on the pizza. To top it off no taco sauce either. I also ordered pineapple pizza and they put one piece on the pizza.

name: Brian Bopp
text: What a bargain! Pizza lunch buffet for $6.50?  All the usual favs plus a salad bar. This restaurant shows its age but the food is still what you would expect, plus great service.

name: Lloyd Richards
text: I would have preferred more pizza choices, but what I had was good. A touch more cinnamon in the desert bresd sticks would be great

name: Michael March
text: Took my son out too lunch we thought pizza hut was a good idea. NOT!!!!!!!!........ the buffet is horrible there was 4 kinds of old cold nasty pizza available. 4 bread stick and 1 dessert stick. The whole building was freezing cold we had …More

name: Amber Montgomery
text: I put my order in online then noticed 40 minutes later that I had no pizzas so I called to find out how long and get told they are being delivered. 10 minutes later still no pizzas so I called again and they tell me that the driver is new …More

name: Betty Brockett
text: Ordered half pepperoni and half supreme so we received very little toppings no sauce and no beef and when I called to complain about it I received no appolige and I told the worker that I will no longer get pizza from them and she laughed and said ok. Yes this is a great way to run a business!!!!

name: The Moore Family
text: The service was really nice and the pizza was super fresh and hot! I will be dining there again!

name: RONALD SORBER
text: Havent been to Pizza Hut for years and have heard so many negative reviews over a period of time, I, decided  to see for myself and was pleasantly suprised..it is a 5 star in my humble opinion as a majority of one. …More

name: Penny Pattee
text: Very good food, wonderful employees

name: Brittany Whiton
text: Had the Buffet. For what I paid, I don't feel it was a good deal. Half the veggies on the salad bar were gone or frozen (the baby carrots were frozen to their container). Lettuce was brown and wilted. …More

name: Terence Rice
text: Had the pizza buffet today. Pizza was hot and fresh. Place was clean and acceptable.  The only reason I did not give it a 5 star rating is because as I was leaving I had thanked the cashier and he looked at me as if I was speaking a foreign …More

text: The best! People are great!

text: Hot, fresh lunch buffet and relatively fast delivery! Delicious and affordable!

text: Cant get the orders right. Young irresponsible kids,who just dont know or care about customer service.

name: Cassi Hale
text: If i could give negative stars I would. Placed a carry out order over phone get there and no order!! Guy in pizza hut didn't care or try and grt my order not even a sorry. Then called and was told i could reorder and that eas it!! Noe my …More

text: The last few times I ordered has been less then acceptable for delivery. So tonight I was tired decided give Pizza Hut another chance at redemption. IMPRESSED! I can't tell you the last time I was this happy with the delivery and the pizza …More

text: Nice management and workers.

name: Jesse Wise
text: They got 1 star because the waitress refilled my water. Went for the lunch buffet, my drink was water. 1130 the 3 pizzas came out. No more came out, the pasta was freezer burnt around the edge.. The waitress refilled my water several times. …More

name: Ana Vilmain
text: A cheese and pepperoni personal pan pizza from Boone....

name: Skelliott Covet
text: We order here once a month at least and I'd say the service is pretty good. Their pizzas are always delicious. I've only had an issue with delivery one time out of the dozens of times we've ordered delivery. They were an hour late, but apparently had car trouble and it was snowing. The pizza was still hot, though.

name: Walter Wittrock
text: EXCELLENT FOOD KIND PEOPLE WOULD COME AGAIN

text:
Worst ever.
Pizza and cheese bread were cold

name: Nancy Woods
text: Pizza was cold and dry.  Very little sauce and cheese.   We ordered a mushroom pizza and one piece actually only had one little mushroom on the whole thing.   Never again.

name: Travis Edwards
text: I Like pizza hut, but it just doesn't seem to be as good as it was when I was younger. Like when their cheese sticks were made with hand tossed dough instead of pan.

name: Rochelle Woodard
text: We ordered pizza & wings. Said they would be done in 15 min but 20 min later still not done! then they actually counted crumbs as a wing!

name: SISSY BROWN
text: I just want to say that... the Tables were filthy.and the Bathroom was disgusting. And  don't get me started on the tacky decorations. BUT thats what I get for choosing Delivery. Good pizza though.

text: If the wings weren’t so good I’d never come here again. Every time I order they are late - 30 min this time. They always seem way under staffed and the place is always dirty.

name: Mike Stanbro
text: I wish I could give no stars. I walked in and told the cashier "I have an online order to pick up" instead of asking me for details she responded with "That doesn't mean anything to me" I will NEVER go back

name: Adam Ribordy
text: The kitchen and delivery staff are always nice and friendly, however whomever owns this store never gives them enough staff to handle their orders. Roughly half the time your order from this store will not be to your satisfaction because …More

name: Zack Batchelder
text: Still not much improved even with new management and a new menu.  First attempt using the new menu resulted in maybe half of our order showing up correctly.  When we called, they offered to either remake the pizzas or give us a credit.  We …More

name: Kalie Skifstad
text: Great service and great food!. I'll be back for sure!

name: Brent Venneman
text: Not great pizza or delivery. I can cook better.

name: Dalton
text: Called in an order and was told it would take 35 minutes for delivery. Over an hour later, the order had still not arrived. I called to cancel my order and the employee was unapologetic.

name: Brian Nichols
text: WOW it's is amazing. I waited 25 minutes, while somone who ordered on the phone took over 2 hours. I don't event think she ever got it.

text: We ordered one large stuffed crust pizza. An hour and a half later we still did not get the food delivered to our house. We called to inform them of the late delivery and they said the pizza would be there within minutes. 15 minutes have …More

text: Food was late getting delivered. Again. And no, not by five minutes, a half hour to fourty-five minutes. Called and got a sarcastic 'Well, our driver is busy so, yeah.' Very 'nice' customer service.

text: If you look hard enough you might find it. This Pizza Hut is badly located. When you do notice it, you're never quite sure if it's open. …More

text: So disappointing. An hour for delivery. Only to get cold pizza and soggy wings. What happened to this once great establishment?

text: Had a delivery. Pizza was cold. Got the wrong wings. Tried calling 7-8 times got no answer. This was at 5:30pm. Little ridiculous. Now I'm stuck with cold pizza and crappy wings

text: Ordered multiple times. Pizza was delivered two full hours later and was delivered cold. Called in and was told they could bring us another pizza in two more hours. Hate this place! Never ever ever again.
